name: Boss Rush: Tibbs Under Fire!
description:
Tibbs should have NEVER declared that he's ready for adventure! The Mountain King has discovered this fledgling adventurer's plan and is coming here NOW to kill him before he gets too powerful!

Slay monsters, gain XP and avoid the Big Bad because he's on his way to YOU RIGHT NOW! AAAH! HE'S COMING THIS WAY!

Programmed and Designed by Wilson Taylor(@DetSpooky on Twitter) and Illustrated by Maia Gross(@GrossGiirl on Twitter)
